title: Calories in a Granny Smith Apple
meta_description: Discover calories in an apple granny smith, including full nutrition breakdown, macros, fiber, and quick variations for this tart green apple.
h1: Calories in a Granny Smith Apple
assumptions: Medium-sized (182 g), raw with skin, fresh; no added toppings or processing.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by apple size, ripeness, variety, and growing conditions. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One medium Granny Smith apple has ~95 kcal, ~4.4 g fiber, and ~25 g carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in an apple granny smith?
faqs.a: About 95 kcal for one medium Granny Smith apple.

faqs.q: What's the fiber content in a Granny Smith apple?
faqs.a: Roughly 4.4 g fiber per medium apple, mostly from the skin.

faqs.q: Are Granny Smith apples low in sugar?
faqs.a: They have ~19 g natural sugars per medium apple, lower than sweeter varieties.

faqs.q: Does peeling a Granny Smith apple change calories?
faqs.a: Slightly; peeling reduces calories by ~5 kcal and lowers fiber.

faqs.q: How do Granny Smith apples compare to red apples nutritionally?
faqs.a: Similar calories (~95 kcal), but Granny Smith are tarter with slightly more fiber and less sugar.
